template.p: Welcome to the Odoo Real Estate Agencies package!
This guide will help you manage your real estate business from A to Z: leads, property listings, visits, offers, and client communication.
Your Odoo Real Estate Agencies package includes essential apps to streamline your operations:

li.p: Use the CRM App to manage your leads and track ongoing buying/selling opportunities
Let clients book property visits easily through the Appointments App
Handle offers, negotiations, and deals in the Sales App
Manage your property listings in a dedicated Properties App
Let potential buyers subscribe to criteria and receive property matches with the Matchmaking Feature
Drive qualified traffic via your Website

template.p: The CRM app is your command center for:

li.p: Managing leads from your website, third-party portals, or manually created entries
Tracking property seekers and owners through each stage of the sales process
Assigning opportunities to agents
Creating and sending quotations directly from the pipeline
Following up through planned CRM Activities like calls, emails, and property visits

p.strong: Leverage incoming leads from any source

div.p: If a property is listed on a third-party portal, add its unique ID to the External Reference field and set the portal’s contact email to buyers@[your_domain].
Any incoming email to that address will automatically create a new lead in the property's pipeline.

div.p: Once a potential buyer is ready to make an offer, leverage the Sign app to send him an offer template. You can try it by clicking on the "Offer" button on a CRM Opportunity.

template.p: The custom Properties App helps you manage your portfolio:

li.p: Create new properties and store all relevant data: address, price, features, status, images, and more
View related opportunities and scheduled visits per property with the smart buttons located on top of each property.
Track and communicate on status updates easily with the ribbon system in the Sales Tab of each property.

div.p: Update your listings regularly
Fresh content boosts your Matchmaking matches and keeps your website relevant.

ul.li: A dedicated form is available on your website, allowing users to subscribe to Matchmaking notifications.
On each contact, you’ll find a Matchmaking tab that outlines their preferences. You can also manually subscribe them to notifications if needed.
Matching properties appear via smart buttons at the top of each Contact page, while matching Contacts are shown the same way on each Property.
Subscribed contacts receive a daily email whenever new matching properties are available.

o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true w-100 px-3
div.p: Each time a property's price is updated, it becomes eligible again for Matchmaking notifications.
If you’d like to manually send an update—or share an initial selection with a contact—you can use the "Send New Matches" button available directly on the Contact page.

p.span: Adapt the email template to your own business!
Add new criteria by adding a new many to many field linked with an attribute in your contact form and the corresponding field in the Matchmaking Form on your website.

template.p: Your website isn’t just for looks—it’s a lead engine!

li.p: Let prospects subscribe to new property alerts using their preferences
Showcase your latest listings with high-quality images and filters
Use a contact form to get lead with a Free Estimate promotion.

o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true w-100 px-3
div.p: Each property has a dedicated form—accessible directly from its product page—that sends leads straight into its sales pipeline.

template.p: Make it easy for visitors to schedule property visits:

li.p: Manage agent availability and avoid double-bookings with calendar sync
Setup visits appointment easily within the Property App.
See all upcoming visits in one unified calendar view
Automatically link visits to related CRM opportunities

div.p: On each Property, you’ll find a "Create Visit Link" button that generates and links the appropriate appointment type to the property.
Once the link is generated, each Opportunity related to this property will display a "Visit" button. Clicking it sends an email notification to your lead, inviting them to book a visit.

template.p: Close deals efficiently using the Sales app:

li.p: Create professional offers or quotation templates in a few clicks
Attach legal documents, contracts, and plans
Follow up with potential buyers and negotiate terms directly from the CRM pipeline
Track sales and commissions

div.p: Commissions are managed in Sales > Commissions. You can add a commission plan and compute commissions for both the Salesperson (the person who closed the deal) and the Seller of the property.
When generating an invoice, make sure to fill in the Seller field to ensure the commission is split correctly.
